channel.title: Private server help please
channel.description:
ok so iv nearly finished my private server iv got a source iv got a no-ip i got hamachi iv got the latest java iv got basicly everything you need, but still im stuck -.-
to start with i dont no how to get my servers name you no like killerscape.no-ip.org or sumthing
secondly i dont really no how to use the testscape source iv got or whatever :S?
thirdly im sh*t with doing stuff like that please help?
also when (if) i get it started up how do i make my self owner and people mods and admins and suchlike?
please help, thanking for future lol
p.s i no i sound like a noob and youll probably say read the stickys or somthing, but i have and i cant find help even though i no its there [br][size=1]Posted at: November 23, 2006, 04:45:45 PM[/size][hr]any1 help me?

item.title: Private server help please

when i try run testscape its unable to run

Read full topic

item.title: Private server help please
item.dc:creator: @Lildevilboi Lildevilboi
item.description:
@Lildevilboi wrote:

In the server files, click runserver? have you done that?
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 23, 2006, 05:44:04 PM[/size][hr]And to change to admin or mod, go into the Character files, choose the name to make admin and open it. At the page it will say CHARACTER RIGHTS: 0 change that to 1 = Mod 2 = Admin 3 = Owner.

Read full topic

item.title: Private server help please
item.dc:creator: @playa-slaya37 playa-slaya37
item.description:
@playa-slaya37 wrote:

ok thanks. i seen you a lot on these bit of forums n u help alot of people :P[br][size=1]Posted at: November 23, 2006, 04:50:29 PM[/size][hr]but how do i make a host/get 1?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 23, 2006, 04:58:53 PM[/size][hr]i got host its playaslayascape.no-ip.info or summat like tht n i try get on it on mopar but it says server must be down adn i got tick next 2 name aswell on no-ip what i do

Read full topic

item.title: Private server help please
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

you have to go to www.no-ip.com and add a host.

and then all you have to do is downlaod no-ip and then open your testscape and press run server.

Read full topic
